user.title: Log Analyzer setup
user.description: Configure how and when to analyze your Home Assistant error logs using an AI conversation agent.

invalid_token.title: Log Analyzer: Invalid or missing access token
invalid_token.description: The error log could not be fetched (401 Unauthorized). Add a valid Long-Lived Access Token in Settings → Devices & Services → Log Analyzer → Configure.

no_conversation_agent.title: Log Analyzer: No conversation agent
no_conversation_agent.description: Analysis failed. Configure a conversation agent (e.g. OpenAI, Google, Ollama) in Home Assistant. Error: {error}
